project_abstract.cdata: The principal objective is to assist the government in increasing production of staple food and thereby increasing farm incomes for some 2.8 million rural families in the North China Plain.  The project will:  (a) improve and expand irrigation and drainage facilities to some 1.14 million ha of low and medium yielding land covering sections of 73 counties in the provinces of Anhui, Jiangsu and Shandong; (b) provide a complementary package of integrated agricultural inputs and support services to increase production; (c) provide institutional development in technical skills, project implementation and management through technical assistance, operational research and training programs; and (d) implement an environmental monitoring management program to sustain the projected agricultural productivity.

P003582.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>加强农业灌溉项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是协助政府部门增加主要粮食作物生产，从而增加华北平原280万左右农户的农业收入。项目将：（1）改造并扩建安徽、江苏和山东三省73县114万公顷左右中低产田的灌溉排水设施；（2）制定一揽子方案，提供综合性农业投入和支持服务，以增加农业生产；（3）开展机构能力建设，通过技术援助、经营研究和培训，增强技术能力以及项目设施和管理能力；（4）实施环境监测管理计划，确保维持预期农业生产率。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
